discussion.author: serenity4
discussion.text: We'd like to keep the name XCB.jl if possible, since it wraps the library of the same name. The compat entries were also updated.

discussion.author: giordano
discussion.text:
> The compat entries were also updated.

Automerge doesn't think so and [this file](https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/blob/0fa5d146ebc1b57e1a1db09de766aa0c3a5938f3/X/XCB/Compat.toml) doesn't have any entry for `CEnum`.  You need to retrigger registration (without changing the version number) so that this pull request is updated

discussion.author: serenity4
discussion.text:
Oh, my bad, I indeed need to retrigger registration. I can't manage to do it though. I tried [here](https://github.com/JuliaGL/XCB.jl/issues/7) (last comment) and [there](https://github.com/JuliaGL/XCB.jl/issues/10), without success.

The instructions from the [README](https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/blob/master/README.md) say
> How do I retrigger Registrator in order to update my pull request?
> 
> Do what you did when you triggered Registrator the first time.

and this is what I did, am I doing something wrong?

discussion.author: giordano
discussion.text: JuliaRegistrator has been down yesterday and until a couple of hours ago.  Try again
